waradiwalata, apayojanawalata ha adhikaranayata yomu wu lamayi nawatha samajagatha kirime karyayan mehidi sidu kere.jathika lama sabhawak sthapitha karamin lamayin bala ganwamin, lamaya kawudayi wataha demin lamayinta uchitha watapitawak nirmanaya karannata memangin uthsaha karanneya.swidanaya, japanaya, nepalaya, indiyawa, pranshaya, jarmaniya, oostreliyawa wani ratawalwalin siya wishaya kshethraya sambandha puhunuwim ha patamalawan hadara wishwaye lama parapura ha ee ee ratawala lamun pilibanda sidu wena karunu karana pilibanda ohuta hodakara watahimak atha.wasara 23 ka rajya sewawak himi ohu thamange aayathanika aramunu mudunpath kara ganima udesa aayathanaya meheyawana gaman lama parapura wenuwen thamata kala yuthu da itu kirimata pasubata noweyi.
